original_text: He also killed all the people in Nob, which was the town where the priests lived. He killed the men and women, children and babies. He also killed the cows, donkeys and sheep.
korean_text: 제사장들의 성읍 놉의 남녀와 아이들과 젖 먹는 자들과 소와 나귀와 양을 칼로 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: He also killed all the people in Nob
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 놉 성의 모든 사람들을 죽였다

sentences.original_text: which was the town where the priests lived
He killed the men and women
He also killed the cows, donkeys and sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 소, 나귀, 양도 죽였다
